About

Annabel Ruddle/NYC&Company

Inclusive and Accessible

Built-in Accessibility features and best practices for assistive technologies, language translation, and more.

What's Included

Dynamic Color System

Effortlessly apply color wherever you wish while keeping an accessible contrast ratio throughout your layouts.

Color Stystem

Beginner Friendly

An unintimidating code base and minimal dependencies make building with the NYC Core Framework ideal for new developers and flexible for seasoned ones.
